We have all become enraged behind the wheel, overreacted to fellow drivers, and regretted honking in a situation that really isn't much more than spilled milk. However, there's a difference between being just a little bit impatient with someone not turning left when they should have turned left, and driving drunk and pinning yourself between cars while also nearly running yourself over. And that is exactly why this article exists.

title: Watch: "Drunk Karen" gets out  of her car and watches it roll away in hilarious road rage incident

If officials in New York City didn’t even know what a trash can was until like five minutes ago, how on earth are they going to import the third world? Because even developing countries know what these “bins for trash pick up” are and it’s unclear what they mean by “trash revolution.”

title: Watch: NYC launches "trash revolution" to clean up city with this one trick... using garbage cans

Whoopi Goldberg, who claims she “steps in so much poop you couldn’t even imagine,” has proved to us all why not everyone should be voting just because they have a pulse. Because she has just claimed that just because Biden may poop his pants from time to time, and just because the man cannot put sentences together, does not mean he cannot hold the job as the most powerful man in the world. Because even the Leader of the Free World “steps in stuff at some point.”

Goldberg announced that she would be voting for Sleepy Joe and does not “care i
title: "I don't care if he's pooped his pants": Whoopi Goldberg goes all in on Biden, even with poopy pants

title: Warning: Facebook's AI Feature is WATCHING you, even if you mute it

It is July Nineth on this, the two-thousandth and twenty-fourth year of our Lord, and Joe Biden is still running for president. I maintain that we're gonna wake up on July 19th to news he is stepping down, but as of me smashing the buttons on the keyboards right now, he is still pretending. Though while he is home calling people he needs to convince that he is still alive, his caregiver, Jill Biden, has been campaigning for him. To Jill's surprise, the media is doing t
title: Jill Biden, Joe's caregiver, lashes out at a once adoring press: "Don't scream at me"

description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

Hello, fellow kids. Do you know what's hip and edgy? Calling Donald Trump Hitler.

*tries kickflip* *falls* *limps away carrying skateboard*

I don't have any evidence that this actually happened, but I imagine that's what it sounded like when The New Republic pitched it's cover to the art department.

We chose the cover image, based on a well-known 1932 Hitler campaign poster, for a precise reason: that anyone transported back to 1932 Germany could very, very easily hav
title: Lefty rag goes full-fuhrer with this lazy, anti-Trump fascistic fan fiction
